title: Take-Profit & Stop-Loss Now Available on ApeX Pro
desc: ApeX Pro is thrilled to announce new features Take-Profit and Stop-Loss — so you can continue maximizing your permissionless perpetual contract trades in the safest way possible.

title: Bounty Bowl: Hunt & Win Up to 50 USDC Per Participant!
desc: To celebrate the upcoming launch of ApeX Pro on mainnet, here’s your chance to hop on board the ApeX Pro train with our exclusive early bird trading bonus giveaway on ApeX Pro Beta.

title: The $APEX-$BANA Connection
desc: As you dive deep into ApeX Pro offerings, here’s the lowdown on the two tokens underpinning not just ApeX Pro, but also the wider ApeX Protocol ecosystem — $APEX and $BANA.

title: 1,500,000 esAPEX With ApeX Pro’s Retroactive Airdrop
desc: Our very first Retroactive Airdrop, where we’ll be sharing a pool of 1,500,000 esAPEX in rewards with professional traders and KOLs in the community!

title: 25,000 USDC in Rewards With ApeX Pro’s Feedback Campaign
desc: We invite all community members to join our user experience journey and participate in our Beta Feedback Campaign for the chance of winning rewards in USDC.

title: ApeX Pro: Order Book Launches Protocol to a New Web 3.0 Social Trading Era
desc: Introducing ApeX Pro, where you can get limitless access to cross-margined perpetual contracts under a new social trading framework.

desc: ICYMI, the long-expected ApeX Staking Program is now live!

title: ApeX Pro Litepaper
desc: Leveraging social trading allows ApeX Pro to offer all traders accelerated trading performance and deep liquidity, while preserving privacy and security in the decentralized space — based on the core belief that trades made together in the Web 3.0 world are better.

title: July Jolly Giveaway (15,000 $APEX Up for Grabs)
desc: We are happy to announce that ApeX will be hosting a very jolly giveaway for our community.

title: The Predator Project — Community Contributors & Community Builders 2.0
desc: ApeX’s community consists of many members with extensive skills. By contributing to the ApeX community, and being an active community contributor, you could earn from a prize pool of $6,000 USDT.

title: ApeX Brawl: Trade to Win (5,000 USDT Up for Grabs)
desc: You’re invited to join our newest “ApeX Brawl: Trade to Win” competition! ICYMI, we’ve prepared a grand prize pool of 5,000 USDT for you.

title: Limit Order on ApeX: Introduction & Use-Case Scenarios
desc: To get our users started with winning trades on ApeX, here’s our quick introduction to limit orders on ApeX — what it’s, and how it works. Read on!

title: ApeX Protocol Tokenomics
desc: Every DeFi protocol has its own protocol token, and the ApeX protocol is no exception. Its native token, $APEX, is built upon Ethereum.

title: ApeX Protocol is Coming to Bybit Launchpad 2.0
desc: ApeX protocol will be the very first DeFi project to go live on the new Bybit Launchpad 2.0 platform. There will be in total 10,000,000 $APEX tokens allocated for the TGE, priced at 0.05 USDT per token.

title: ApeX NFT Rebates Campaign Snapshot Announcement
desc: We know that you all have been patiently waiting for this moment, and we’re so happy to finally reveal all the Snapshot and Rebates claiming details regarding our NFT Rebates Campaign.

desc: To celebrate the launch of our new product features and show our warm welcome to all new traders on ApeX Protocol, we have decided to launch the first round of ApeX’s Airdrop Campaign!

title: The Value of ApeX Predator NFT and ApeX NFT Games (One Last Ape Standing)
desc: ApeX NFT has the subscription interest of the protocol’s governance token, as well as the proof of equity interest of its VIPs in ApeX’s future Loyalty Program.
